camera.follow.name: Follow Unit
camera.follow.desc: Follow the first unit in the selection.

camera.rallypointfocus.name: Focus on rallypoint
camera.rallypointfocus.desc: Focus the camera on the rally point of the selected building.

camera.lastattackfocus.name: Focus on last attack notification
camera.lastattackfocus.desc: Focus the camera on the position of the last attack notification.

camera.zoom.wheel.in.name: Zoom in (step-by-step)
camera.zoom.wheel.in.desc: Zoom camera in - the effect depends on FPS.

camera.zoom.wheel.out.name: Zoom out (step-by-step)
camera.zoom.wheel.out.desc: Zoom camera out - the effect depends on FPS.

camera.rotate.wheel.cw.name: Rotate clockwise
camera.rotate.wheel.cw.desc: Rotate camera clockwise around terrain - the effect depends on FPS.

camera.rotate.wheel.ccw.name: Rotate counterclockwise
camera.rotate.wheel.ccw.desc: Rotate camera counterclockwise around terrain - the effect depends on FPS.

camera.pan.name: Pan camera
camera.pan.desc: Enable scrolling by moving the mouse.

camera.jump.1.name: Jump to camera 1
camera.jump.1.desc: Jump to camera position 1 (see “Set camera jump 1”).

camera.jump.2.name: Jump to camera 2
camera.jump.2.desc: Jump to camera position 2 (see “Set camera jump 2”).

camera.jump.3.name: Jump to camera 3
camera.jump.3.desc: Jump to camera position 3 (see “Set camera jump 3”).

camera.jump.4.name: Jump to camera 4
camera.jump.4.desc: Jump to camera position 4 (see “Set camera jump 4”).
